meanings.definition: Covered or protected by an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: The umbrellaed child stayed dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She walked down the street umbrellaed from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The umbrellaed cat looked quite fashionable.
meanings.sent4: The umbrellaed tree seemed to be guarding the garden.
meanings.sent5: The umbrellaed picnic table was a popular spot during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The umbrellaed table kept the guests shaded.
meanings.sent2: He was umbrellaed during the sudden downpour.
meanings.sent3: The umbrellaed dog wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The umbrellaed street vendor attracted many customers.
meanings.sent5: The umbrellaed patio was a cozy place to relax.

meanings.definition: Sheltered or shielded by an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: The umbrellaed couple enjoyed a romantic walk in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The umbrellaed bus stop provided refuge from the storm.
meanings.sent3: The umbrellaed squirrel seemed to be playing hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The umbrellaed beach chair was a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent5: The umbrellaed garden gnome looked like a tiny guardian.
